info.title: Yahoo Weather API
info.description: Get up-to-date weather information for any location, including 5-day forecast, wind, atmosphere, astronomy conditions, and more. You can lookup weather by woeid, city name or lat/long.

parameters.name: u
parameters.description: Units for temperature (case sensitive). f: Fahrenheit, c: Celsius.

parameters.name: w
parameters.description: The location for the weather forecast as a WOEID, example is Palo Alto, CA.
